Text saved: Based on our findings, we recommend that Girox Foods should use a management style that focuses more on its people. We should look for ways to offer employees more flexible working hours. We should also consider how we can allow them to work from a location they choose. Managers need to find different ways to challenge their staff. They also need to give more positive feedback and show that they value the work people do. Spending more money on professional training could also help create a positive work environment. This is especially important for social and communication skills. This will help employees to do their best work.

Text saved: Based on our results, we recommend a new management style. This style should focus more on people. We should offer employees more choice in their working hours. We should also let them work from a location they choose. Managers need to find different ways to challenge their staff. They should also give positive comments about their work. They must show they value what their employees do. Spending more money on professional training could also help. This can create a positive work environment. This is very important for social and communication skills. This will help employees do their best work.
